channel.title: Hawtio on Apache Camel
channel.description: Recent content in Hawtio on Apache Camel

item.title: Hawtio v3 release and Camel CLI
item.description: The Hawtio development team is really excited to announce the general availability of Hawtio 3.0.0 to the Apache Camel community! Hawtio is a classic tool for managing Java/JVM applications with a web UI. It has long been a core favourite among Java and Camel engineers as a web GUI management console for Java and Camel applications. However, it was based on stale JavaScript frameworks 1, which made further enhancements and maintenance difficult.
